metadata.title: CVE-2022-28282 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
security update

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-28282` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
firefox-geckodriver - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:91.8.1+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:91.8.1+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:91.8.1+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:91.8.1+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
xul-ext-gdata-provider - 1:91.8.1+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
xul-ext-lightning - 1:91.8.1+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2').
thunderbird package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:91.8.1+build1-0ubuntu0.21.10.1').
